languages.text: "По Футфолу ходят слухи о ксеносах, творящих бесчинства по всему сектору. Как ты думаешь, это могут быть твои сородичи с Крудараха?"
"Footfall is abuzz with rumours about xenos ravaging the sector. Do you think it could be your kin from Crudarach?"
languages.original_text: "По Футфолу ходят слухи о ксеносах, творящих бесчинства по всему сектору. Как ты думаешь, это могут быть твои сородичи с Крудараха?"

traits.locale_text: "Footfall is abuzz with rumors about xenos ravaging the sector. Do you think it could be your kin from Crudarach?"
"Footfall is abuzz with rumors about xenos ravaging the sector. Do you think it could be your kin from Crudarach?"
"Footfall is abuzz with rumors about xenos ravaging the sector. Do you think it could be your kin from Crudarach?"
"Footfall is abuzz with rumors about xenos ravaging the sector. Do you think it could be your kin from Crudarach?"
"Footfall is abuzz with rumours about xenos ravaging the sector. Do you think it could be your kin from Crudarach?"

languages.text: “落脚港有很多传言，说这片区域遭到了异形的袭击。你觉得这些事情会不会是你在克鲁达拉赫的族人做的？”
languages.original_text: "Footfall is abuzz with rumours about xenos ravaging the sector. Do you think it could be your kin from Crudarach?"

traits.locale_text: “落脚港有很多传言，说这片区域遭到了异形的袭击。你觉得这些事情会不会是你在克鲁达拉赫的族人做的？”

languages.text: «Paso está lleno de rumores de xenos arrasando el sector. ¿Cree que puede ser obra de sus hermanos de Crudarach?».
languages.original_text: "Footfall is abuzz with rumours about xenos ravaging the sector. Do you think it could be your kin from Crudarach?"

traits.locale_text: «Paso está lleno de rumores de xenos arrasando el sector. ¿Cree que puede ser obra de sus hermanos de Crudarach?».

languages.text: 「フットフォールは異種族が宙域を荒らし回ったという噂で溢れている。その異種族はクルダラの同族だと思うのか？」
languages.original_text: "Footfall is abuzz with rumours about xenos ravaging the sector. Do you think it could be your kin from Crudarach?"

traits.locale_text: 「フットフォールは異種族が宙域を荒らし回ったという噂で溢れている。その異種族はクルダラの同族だと思うのか？」

languages.text: "In Footfall gehen Gerüchte um, dass Xenos den Sektor verwüsten. Könnte das Euer Volk aus Crudarach sein?"
languages.original_text: "Footfall is abuzz with rumours about xenos ravaging the sector. Do you think it could be your kin from Crudarach?"

traits.locale_text: "In Footfall gehen Gerüchte um, dass Xenos den Sektor verwüsten. Könnte das Euer Volk aus Crudarach sein?"

languages.text: « Le bruit court à Castel que des xénos ravagent le secteur. Pensez-vous que ce soient vos semblables de Crudarach ? »
languages.original_text: "Footfall is abuzz with rumours about xenos ravaging the sector. Do you think it could be your kin from Crudarach?"

traits.locale_text: « Le bruit court à Castel que des xénos ravagent le secteur. Pensez-vous que ce soient vos semblables de Crudarach ? »

languages.text: "Binliman, sektörü yakıp yıkan zenoların söylentileriyle çalkalanıyor. Sence bahsi geçenler, Crudarach'taki soydaşların olabilir mi?"
languages.original_text: "Footfall is abuzz with rumours about xenos ravaging the sector. Do you think it could be your kin from Crudarach?"

traits.locale_text: "Binliman, sektörü yakıp yıkan zenoların söylentileriyle çalkalanıyor. Sence bahsi geçenler, Crudarach'daki soydaşların olabilir mi?"
